title: TableIR
description: Intermediate representation between VedaLang source and Excel output. Defines the structure of VEDA tables to be emitted.

files.description: List of Excel workbook files to generate

file.description: An Excel workbook file containing one or more worksheets

path.description: Relative path to the Excel file (e.g., 'base/base.xlsx')

sheets.description: List of worksheets in this workbook

sheet.description: A worksheet within an Excel workbook containing VEDA tables

name.description: Name of the worksheet (Excel tab name)

tables.description: List of VEDA tables on this worksheet

table.description: A VEDA table identified by its tag, containing data rows

tag.description: VEDA tag identifying the table type (e.g., '~FI_PROCESS', '~FI_T', '~TFM_INS')

rows.description: List of data rows in the table

row.description: A data row containing column-value pairs. Column names are dynamic based on the VEDA tag.
